tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE healthcare_providers (
  provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  provider_email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
  provider_address VARCHAR(255),
  provider_phone VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  patient_email VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
  patient_address VARCHAR(255),
  patient_phone VARCHAR(15),
  patient_dob DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    patient_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    patient_phone VARCHAR(15),
    patient_dob DATE
);

CREATE TABLE healthcare_providers (
    provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_name VARCHAR(50),
    provider_specialty VARCHAR(50),
    provider_email VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    provider_phone VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE communications (
    comm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sender_id INT,
    receiver_id INT,
    message_text TEXT,
    comm_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sender_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (receiver_id) REFERENCES healthcare_providers(provider_id)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  birth_date DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  provider_id INT,
  record_date DATE,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(255),
  prescription VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  provider_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  appointment_time TIME,
  appointment_purpose TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
	patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	age INT NOT NULL,
	gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
	insurance_info VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
	appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
	healthcare_provider_id UUID REFERENCES healthcare_providers(healthcare_provider_id),
	appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
	status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE messages (
	message_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	sender_id UUID,
	receiver_id UUID,
	message_text TEXT NOT NULL,
	timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
	record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
	healthcare_provider_id UUID REFERENCES healthcare_providers(healthcare_provider_id),
	record_text TEXT NOT NULL,
	record_date DATE NOT NULL
);
